notes: mass/invariable noun; commonly with definite article
rare; mostly used with definite article

example_sentence_italian: Abbiamo visto del peggio in passato.
example_sentence_english: We have seen some of the worst in the past.
You also learn from the worst.
In the worst times we stay united.
I do not want to dwell on the worst.

example_sentence_italian: Ha fatto i conti col peggio.
